name: test_storage_mount
description:
arrange: a bare Jenkins charm.
    act: Add a job, scale the charm to 0 unit and scale back to 1.
    assert: The job configuration persists and is the same as the one used.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: a bare Jenkins charm.
act: Add a job, scale the charm to 0 unit and scale back to 1.
assert: The job configuration persists and is the same as the one used.
